pages.title: Casing
pages.text: Casing blocks are the building blocks of the Fluidizer.$(br2)They are required to build its frame and are also used to craft the other parts. Casing blocks can also be used to fill the faces of the Fluidizer if you don't like glass too much.

pages.usage.text: $(l)Mandatory:$() they are required to build the frame$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no
